name: Hero HQ
description: Hero Headquarters is a "Create Your Own Adventure" themed comic book web app created to fulfill a semester-long team project in Stony Brook University's Software Engineering course. You can browse the site in a number of ways to read comics published by other users, and even design your own comics using our own content creator. We also include a Google sign in feature, which lets us tailor your custom homepage based on your comic history, and subscriptions of your choice.

name: Startpage
description: Personal homepage created to quickly navigate to frequently visited websites more easily. Hotkeys can be viewed by hovering on each of the 8 icon categories. Pressing a hotkey will queue the correlating website and 'Enter' will open websites in order. 'Backspace' removes all hotkeys from the queue.

name: Natural Language Processing Steam Reviews
description: NLP Steam Reviews is a sentiment analyzer web app created as a final project for the Natural Language Processing elective at Stony Brook University. My partner and I scrape ~75,000 reviews from the Steam website along with their recommended/not recommended rating. We use this information to predict the recommended value for other games using the Turney algorithm.

name: Personal Portfolio
description: Simple angular app to display projects.
